SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN tch_lv = '' OR tch_lv IS NULL THEN '미등록' WHEN tch_lv = '초급' THEN tch_lv WHEN tch_lv = '중급' THEN tch_lv WHEN tch_lv = '고급' THEN tch_lv WHEN tch_lv = '특급' THEN tch_lv END) AS tchCnt , CASE WHEN tch_lv = '' OR tch_lv IS NULL THEN '미등록' WHEN tch_lv = '초급' THEN tch_lv WHEN tch_lv = '중급' THEN tch_lv WHEN tch_lv = '고급' THEN tch_lv WHEN tch_lv = '특급' THEN tch_lv END AS tchLv FROM v_user_info WHERE dept_id NOT IN ('10200000011', '10200000012') AND NOT id = '10100000001' AND NOT wrk_type = '010404' GROUP BY tchLv
SELECT yr_dt, cli_nm, suply_val, unit FROM client_sales WHERE yr_dt BETWEEN #{searchDate} AND (SELECT yr_dt FROM client_sales ORDER BY yr_dt DESC LIMIT 1)

SELECT a.yr_dt, ROUND((a.ttl_asset / 10000), 0) as ttl_asset, ROUND((a.capital / 10000), 0) AS capital, ROUND((a.eqty_cptl / 10000), 0) AS eqty_cptl, ROUND((a.crnt_lblts / 10000), 0) AS crnt_lblts, ROUND((b.consulting / 10000), 0) AS consulting, ROUND((b.sysdev_part / 10000), 0) AS sysdev_part, ROUND((b.sm_part / 10000), 0) AS sm_part, ROUND((b.sw_part / 10000), 0) AS sw_part, ROUND((b.total_sales / 10000), 0) AS total_sales, '만원' AS unit FROM capital AS a, sales AS b WHERE a.yr_dt = b.yr_dt AND a.yr_dt BETWEEN #{searchStartDate} AND #{searchEndDate}

SELECT a.yr_dt, ROUND((a.ttl_asset / 10000), 0) as ttl_asset, ROUND((a.capital / 10000), 0) AS capital, ROUND((a.eqty_cptl / 10000), 0) AS eqty_cptl, ROUND((a.crnt_lblts / 10000), 0) AS crnt_lblts, ROUND((b.consulting / 10000), 0) AS consulting, ROUND((b.sysdev_part / 10000), 0) AS sysdev_part, ROUND((b.sm_part / 10000), 0) AS sm_part, ROUND((b.sw_part / 10000), 0) AS sw_part, ROUND((b.total_sales / 10000), 0) AS total_sales, '만원' AS unit FROM capital AS a, sales AS b WHERE a.yr_dt = b.yr_dt AND a.yr_dt BETWEEN #{searchDate} AND (SELECT yr_dt FROM capital ORDER BY yr_dt DESC LIMIT 1)

select case when timestampdiff(month, emply_dt, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) < 3 then '3개월이하' when 3 <= timestampdiff(month, emply_dt, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) and timestampdiff(month, emply_dt, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) < 6 then '3개월이상' when 6 <= timestampdiff(month, emply_dt, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) and timestampdiff(month, emply_dt, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) < 12 then '6개월이상' when 12 <= timestampdiff(month, emply_dt, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) and timestampdiff(month, emply_dt, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) < 24 then '1년이상' when 24 <= timestampdiff(month, emply_dt, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) and timestampdiff(month, emply_dt, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) < 36 then '2년이상' when timestampdiff(month, emply_dt, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) >= 36 then '3년이상' end as years, count(case when timestampdiff(month, emply_dt, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) < 3 then '3개월이하' when 3 <= timestampdiff(month, emply_dt, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) and timestampdiff(month, emply_dt, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) < 6 then '3개월이상' when 6 <= timestampdiff(month, emply_dt, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) and timestampdiff(month, emply_dt, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) < 12 then '6개월이상' when 12 <= timestampdiff(month, emply_dt, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) and timestampdiff(month, emply_dt, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) < 24 then '1년이상' when 24 <= timestampdiff(month, emply_dt, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) and timestampdiff(month, emply_dt, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) < 36 then '2년이상' when timestampdiff(month, emply_dt, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) >= 36 then '3년이상' end) as work_yr from v_user_info where emply_dt is not null group by years order by field(years, '3개월이하', '3개월이상', '6개월이상', '1년이상', '2년이상')
